#THIS FILE IS AUTO GENERATED FROM THE TEMPLATE! DO NOT CHANGE!
if (APPLE OR WIN32)
    return()
endif()
SET(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME Generic)
SET(CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 1)
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 99)
add_definitions(-DprojCOVERAGE_TEST=1)

include_directories(./ freertos/Common/include freertos/Source/include freertos/Source/portable/ThirdParty/GCC/Posix freertos/Source/portable/ThirdParty/GCC/Posix/utils)
file(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES console.c code_coverage_additions.c main_blinky.c main.c run-time-stats-utils.c "freertos/Demo/Common/Minimal/*.*" "freertos/Source/*.c" "freertos/Source/portable/MemMang/*.*")
set(CMAKE_THREAD_PREFER_PTHREAD ON)
set(THREADS_PREFER_PTHREAD_FLAG ON)
find_package(Threads REQUIRED)
add_executable(freertos_posix ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(freertos_posix PRIVATE Threads::Threads)
